storyInfo:
A party of Rhodes Island members arrives at the tourist city of Siesta, and everyone seems to be enjoying themselves.
Just when the Doctor is about to surrender to the merriment, an urgent message arrives...

attributes.content: The sample data from the volcano monitoring station has been retrieved. Please look over it.
Just tell me the results.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: Those people over there said that the sample's temperature has not yet exceeded the highest on record for this year.
It's also not quite at the levels of the peaks from the past three years. The state of steam emissions is normal as well.
So...
So?
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: So, the station concludes that nothing abnormal will happen with the volcano, and your request for announcement has been denied once again. The mayor also...
You've got to be kidding me!!
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: Although my methods may be a bit simple, I'm sure that there's something amiss about this sample here.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: The volcano was already in a precarious state last year!
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: But they didn't even send a warning or make a news report! Nothing at all!!
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: Miss Ceylon, p-please calm down.
If the monitoring station says that there's no abnormality, nobody will trust us no matter what we do.
I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Can we really rely on the monitoring station's data?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: To be honest, Siesta's City Council doesn't pay much attention to this. Perhaps something is wrong with the detector.
That would mean that the fact that the volcano has become abnormal is being covered up.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: So, what are you going to do next?
I can't explain the current phenomenon based upon what I know. If we can't get an accurate report from those in charge, we'll have to turn to an outside organization.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: So far, things are stable here and we still have time. Would we be able to find some professionals among the tourists here if we took the time?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Even though we can't expect to find the right people, nor can we expect them to reach the correct conclusion, this is our last chance...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The tourists have already begun to pour into Siesta.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: After all, the Obsidian Festival is about to begin. If we don't act now, it'll soon be too late.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: 10:10 A.M. \ Clear
Siesta
Dear tourists, welcome to Siesta, home of the annual Obsidian Festival.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Thank you for choosing Siesta as your vacation getaway. You won't be disappointed!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Here, scorching heat is turned into sizzling passion, freeing you from the stress and exhaustion of daily life. Immerse yourself in the charms that Siesta City has to offer!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: This year, there's more to Siesta than just our sunny beaches and dazzling azure waters. Don't you forget about the great Obsidian Festival!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Over the next two weeks, there will be delicious food, fun activities around the clock, and last but not least, the greatest music festival ever!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: We've invited the hottest names from all over the musical world as our special guests, to bring you an exciting music festival you won't forget!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: During the festival, we've opened up various facilities and activities to the public, free of charge, so play to your heart's content!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: In Civic Square, the Rock Party and the unlimited supply of local beer are the stars of the show!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Cut loose, and lose yourself to the rhythm!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Looking for something more leisurely? The jazz paradise is located just on the square of Herman Hotel on Second Avenue.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: No rules, and no limits. As long as you want to be here, we want you here as well!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: The Garrison Amusement Park is open 24/7 during the festival, and boasts the biggest stage in the city.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Other than the regularly scheduled shows, we'll also have some special guest appearances. If you're a fan of rap, you're not going to want to miss out!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: In addition, there will be plenty of shows and activities throughout the city for you to enjoy.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Please ask the staff as well as the guards for a map of the festival.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: We've marked the event locations as well as their times to make it easier for you to plan in advance.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: But while you're enjoying the merriment, make sure to pay attention to the weather.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Today's temperature is 96.8° F, the highest recorded this summer. Please avoid staying in the sun too long to prevent sunburn and heatstroke.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Thank you, and have a great time!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Siesta really is a prime tourist city. The atmosphere here is filled with excitement.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I didn't expect it to be this lively here.;They've been holding one large event after another.

attributes.content: Neither did I!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: None of us expected it to be such a spectacular place. We originally thought it was just another normal coastal city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thanks for the recommendation, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I'm not interested in that place. Just go there yourselves.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait for me! I wanna come too!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Stop right there. You're not allowed to go since you're still recovering.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I don't mind a place like this.;Her recommendations are definitely spot on.

attributes.content: Doctor, I'm happy as long as you're enjoying it here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've been through too much recently. You deserve a break.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A lot of our fellow Operators have come with us, so let's all take this opportunity to relax.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, Doctor, look! Someone's playing the piano in public.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Look, there are guitarists over there, as well as violinists. Wow, even dancers too...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It reminds me of when I used to practice the violin every day.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The streets give off a totally different vibe than the beach.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is my first time seeing so many performers in one place, it makes me want to join them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No no, that's not what I meant. I'm not really going to join them!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If I wanted to get back to the level I was at before, I'd have to start practicing again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: But I don't think those guys are any better than you.

attributes.content: Th-that's not true!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, I'm still happy to hear you say that, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hey, Sora?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, Doctor! Amiya! Good morning, are you two also headed to Second Avenue?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Good morning, Sora. I didn't know you were a fan of jazz as well.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I thought you would've preferred pop music more.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When it comes to music, I'm an expert in all the genres!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: ...Actually, I wanted to check out some other places, but the show near the hotel last night was way too loud. I couldn't sleep without earplugs.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Even though it's great to be able to listen to music throughout the day, anything will get on your nerves if it's keeping you up at night.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Because the others got a bit too crazy last night, all I can do is take a little breather around here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's a music festival after all, that just proves how lively things are here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahaha, guess so. A few of us have never seen the ocean before.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: For example, Ifrit rushed out this morning yelling something like 'Here I come, ocean!!' We haven't seen her ever since.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Haha, that's just like her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Technically, this ocean is really just a huge lake...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as there's water and a beach, it's enough of an ocean for me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll be resting here until noon. After that, even a volcanic eruption can't stop me from having the time of my life!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Haha, that certainly is your style. All right, I'll see you around then.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All righty~ Amiya, Doctor, have a good time as well!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It is now 11 o'clock! Everyone, did you have a fabulous morning?
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Let's first enjoy a cozy Siestan brunch as the merriment of the afternoon approaches us.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Today, a special guest will be joining us. Let's welcome Mister Cronin, Assistant to the Mayor of Siesta and Catastrophe Messenger. Mister Cronin, why don't you tell us a bit more about Siesta and its volcano?
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Welcome to Siesta City, my friends.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: Siesta is home to lush mountains and clear waters, sunny skies and refreshing breezes, and the most passionate people in the world.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: Due to the rare and perfect natural environment that we've been gifted, Siesta is committed to becoming the best tourist hotspot and bringing you an unforgettable summer getaway.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: On this subject, let's talk about the Siesta Volcano. Many tourists who are unfamiliar with volcanoes may have questions about this. Care to explain it to our listeners?
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Gladly. First, there's nothing to be worried about. Unlike what some people may think, the Siesta Volcano is our friend, not something filled with mysteries and dangers.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: I can guarantee this as a Catastrophe Messenger, so please rest assured.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: As you may already know, Siesta's development owes greatly to the Siesta Volcano.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: Some of you may remember the Catastrophe that almost hit Siesta a number of years back. But because of the volcano's protection, Siesta was totally unaffected.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: Speaking of which, Siesta has another special feature - obsidian.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Obsidian is believed to have the ability to suppress Oripathy, so it has become increasingly popular in recent years.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: That's right. The small number of Infected in Siesta is the best proof of that.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: You may have heard rumors or even scientific 'theories' from outside, but the reality within Siesta is the best evidence.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: Unfortunately, obsidian mining has been banned by the government in order to protect the volcano's habitat.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: Nevertheless, the trade of existing obsidian products is legal, so if you're interested in these products, please head over to the market.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: During the festival, shopping guides as well as souvenir stalls will be scattered throughout the city, so feel free to take your pick!
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: The volcano has brought Siesta a precious gift, and it is our wish to pass this gift onto all of you. We hope that you will all enjoy the festival.
attributes.name: Cronin

attributes.content: Thank you very much, Mister Cronin. We will see you later.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Obsidian can keep Oripathy at bay? I've never heard about that before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that Catastrophe Messenger... the way he was dismissing science made me a bit uncomfortable...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Wouldn't it be great if Oripathy could be cured so easily?;Tourist cities always have some way to make a quick buck.

attributes.content: In remote places like this, many people still do not know about Originium or Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't know if that's a blessing or a curse.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course ignorance is a curse!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Skyfire, Provence! Good morning!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Morning, Amiya. Doctor.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: What a coincidence to run into you guys here. Getting ready to hit the beach?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: We're just looking around. What about you two?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're going to take a look around the base of the volcano.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: The base of the volcano? Let me check the map.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's no mark on it. Is there some special activity going on there?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, no. Skyfire just suddenly felt like taking a field trip.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: And I'm a Catastrophe Messenger, as you know. Taking a quick survey of the land when I get to a new place has just become a habit of mine.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: As a researcher, I'm curious about the ecosystem of the volcano. We rarely get the chance to get up close and personal with a volcano, after all.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: That's some serious dedication, to be doing this during your vacation, Skyfire.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Eheh. Of course. For me, that's what a vacation is.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: All right then, we have to get going. Bye!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Then, we should get going as well, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The largest beach in Siesta is just ahead of us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let's go!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: One Mango Martini Smoothie please.
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Okay. Here you go, a Mango Martini Smoothie.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Two double-scoops of Strawberry Tequila Ice Cream please.
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Here you are! Two double-scoops of Strawberry Tequila Ice Cream, coming right up! And, you get a free waffle!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Gummy~
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, Amiya! And the Doctor as well. Good to see you~
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Gummy, how'd you end up running a stall here?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's an entire food court by the beach. The sponsor gave the chance for tourists to show off their cooking skills.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Given an opportunity like this, I naturally had to promote some of Ursus's local favorites!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: However, there are way too many tourists here, and I'm getting a bit overwhelmed.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hey Miss, I'd like three cups of Fermented Bubble Tea with Pudding.
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Coming right up!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Oh right, Doctor, can I borrow Amiya for a bit?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If Amiya is helping me out, I'll be just fine.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: After we're done here, I'll take her to watch the show on the beach at night!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.options: You should go, Amiya.;Don't stress her out.;Can't I also help out?

attributes.content: Mm... all right then.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, call me if you need anything, okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm, you know what Gummy thinks? Amiya's stressed out from always following you around, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: When she's with you, she never thinks about herself, which isn't good.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: It, it's not like that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not buying it.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Besides, Doctor, you're going to scare away all my customers, all wrapped up like a mummy. Amiya is way cuter than you.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Th-that's not true... But, Doctor, I'll stay here and help Gummy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, Amiya, let me teach you how to use this machine.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, no, you gotta change your outfit first. Hurry, over here, let me get you into something a bit easier to move around in!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Doctor, you make sure to enjoy yourself as well! Buh bye!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.options: Amiya should spend more time with her peers.;(Guess I'll go take a look the beachside open-air hotel by myself.);Maybe I really should change into something a bit more summery...

attributes.content: Hey, did you hear that? There was another fight at First Avenue last night.
attributes.name: Male Tourist A

attributes.content: No, I live on Fifth. I reckon it was another fight between fans?
attributes.name: Male Tourist B

attributes.content: Yeah. Jeez, talk about crazy. The way those guys were going at it, you'd think they killed the other guy's parents or something.
attributes.name: Male Tourist A

attributes.content: Peace is best, after all.
attributes.name: Male Tourist B

attributes.content: ...So, why don't you take off that outfit of yours already? ！
attributes.name: Male Tourist A

attributes.content: It's not every day we get to go on vacation, so why are you all wrapped up like that?
attributes.name: Male Tourist A

attributes.content: Hey, were you not going to come tonight? Join us!
attributes.name: Female Tourist A

attributes.content: ...Don't tell me you're going dancing again tonight.
attributes.name: Female Tourist C

attributes.content: Of course we're going. We came here to dance!
attributes.name: Female Tourist A

attributes.content: Give me a break, just go by yourselves then. I can barely feel my feet from following you guys the last three nights...
attributes.name: Female Tourist C

attributes.content: Come on, it's still early! Give it a few more tries, and you'll get used to it!
attributes.name: Female Tourist A

attributes.content: Hello, whiskey for two.
attributes.name: Waiter

attributes.content: Well well, with the way you're dressed, you look a bit unusual for a tourist...

attributes.options: ...I'm a bit scared of sun exposure.

attributes.content: Even so, you came out all the way to the beach? What a weirdo.
...Ah, I suppose I'm one to talk though.
Sorry about that, let me put that one on my tab.

attributes.options: (Weren't the drinks supposed to be free?!)

attributes.content: So, what do you think about this budding city?
I'm quite fond of her, you see. Youthful, but maturing well.
Though I wasn't born here, this place is my home now.
And I'm willing to pay a lot in order to protect it.
No matter where people are from, they all hold the same love for their family, right?
Boss, Mister Cronin is looking for you.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: ...I know.
I still have work to do. I'll be off then, stranger.
I hope that you too can fall in love with this city.

attributes.options: What a weird person.;What a friendly person.;What a good-looking person.

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, can you hear me?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Is there anyone by you? I have something very serious to report!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: It's something that may influence whether this city lives or dies...
attributes.name: Provence
